extendedIngredients.name: corn starch
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tsp. of tapioca, potato or corn starch dispersed in 1/4 c. of broth (or water if broth isn't available)

extendedIngredients.name: red bell pepper
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 large red bell pepper (green is okay but red looks better for this dish), diced

extendedIngredients.name: sesame seed oil
extendedIngredients.originalString: a drizzle of sesame seed oil

extendedIngredients.name: red beans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tbsp. of fermented black beans, drained and lightly pounded

extendedIngredients.name: tofu
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 firm tofu, about 300 grams (see deciphering tofu labels)

recipes.title: Tofu and black beans stir fry
recipes.instructions: InstructionsCut the tofu into bite-size pieces.Heat the cooking oil in a wok or frying pan, and fry the tofu until golden brown (see tips). Scoop out the the tofu (a kitchen spider is useful) and drain off the excess oil by placing the tofu in a strainer or a stack of paper towels.Pour off the cooking oil from the pan, leaving only about a tablespoonful. Heat the oil, and saute the black beans and garlic until fragrant. Add the bell pepper and celery, and continue stir frying for about 30 seconds.Pour in the rice wine. Stir in the black pepper and sugar. Toss a few times then add the tofu.Pour in the starch solution. Adjust the seasonings. Stir and toss alternately over high heat. When the sauce is thick and clear, turn off the heat. Drizzle in the sesame seed oil and stir a few times.Transfer the tofu and black beans stir fry to a serving plate or bowl and serve hot.

steps.step: Cut the tofu into bite-size pieces.

Heat the cooking oil in a wok or frying pan, and fry the tofu until golden brown (see tips). Scoop out the the tofu (a kitchen spider is useful) and drain off the excess oil by placing the tofu in a strainer or a stack of paper towels.
Pour off the cooking oil from the pan, leaving only about a tablespoonful.
Heat the oil, and saute the black beans and garlic until fragrant.
Add the bell pepper and celery, and continue stir frying for about 30 seconds.
Pour in the rice wine. Stir in the black pepper and sugar. Toss a few times then add the tofu.
Pour in the starch solution. Adjust the seasonings. Stir and toss alternately over high heat. When the sauce is thick and clear, turn off the heat.
Drizzle in the sesame seed oil and stir a few times.
Transfer the tofu and black beans stir fry to a serving plate or bowl and serve hot.
